/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and creating a lens flare in the top left corner of the image. The street is devoid of any cars or people, adding to the tranquility of the scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the perspective. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a peaceful and picturesque view of a street in Beijing.
